gantrytips.tip: The CSS Style setting allows you to easily change the whole look of your site. The different CSS styles are a selection of preset settings such as background colors and font settings. A little preview thumbnail can be seen in the Overview tab.

The Background Color setting provides the ability to easily change the color used as the background. Colors can be inputted via the Colorchooser popup selector or manually using a hex code in the input field.

Choose Fix if you do not want moving background (it will stay fix and you can not scroll it). Choose Float to see your whole picture (you can sroll it but in some point your picture will propably end).
If you do not want to show background image choose No. It will be replaced by background color.
This will work only if you have selected custom CSS style. You can choose the color in which you would like to have the main elements.

The Link Color setting provides the ability to easily change the color used to highlight links. Colors can be inputted via the Colorchooser popup selector or manually using a hex code in the input field.

The Link Hover Color setting provides the ability to easily change the color used to highlight links. Colors can be inputted via the Colorchooser popup selector or manually using a hex code in the input field.
